title: How to Download the Old Version of CapCut Video Editor
review_html:
CapCut is a powerful and free video editing tool that offers users an intuitive interface and robust editing features. Whether you are a beginner or a professional, CapCut can meet your video editing needs. However, due to device compatibility or other reasons, users may sometimes need to download an older version of the CapCut Video Editor. This article provides a detailed guide on how to download an old version of CapCut on Android devices.

Introduction to CapCut

CapCut is a video editing application developed by Bytedance. It offers powerful video trimming, special effects, and audio adjustment features. The app enables users to create high-quality videos at no cost. Moreover, CapCut is compatible with both Android and iOS systems, making it highly convenient for users worldwide.

System Requirements

To ensure smooth operation, the latest version of CapCut (13.6.0) requires Android 5.0 or higher. However, if your device does not meet this requirement, it is recommended to opt for an older version of CapCut. This can improve compatibility and avoid potential performance issues.

Steps to Download an Old Version of CapCut on Android

If you decide to download an older version of CapCut, follow these steps:

  1. Visit APKZonic Website
    Open your browser and go to APKZonic. Search for "CapCut Video Editor" in the search bar.

  2. Find Older Versions
    On the CapCut details page, scroll down to the "Older Versions" section. Click the "View All Versions" button to browse the list of available older versions.

  3. Select the Desired Version
    Based on your device requirements and personal preferences, select a suitable older version and click the download button.

  4. Download and Install
    Once the download is complete, open the file to install it. If you are installing an app from APKZonic for the first time, you need to enable the "Unknown Sources" option in your device settings.

Available Older Versions of CapCut

APKZonic offers multiple older versions of CapCut, allowing users to choose according to their needs. Below are some common older versions and their details:

  • Version: 12.8.0
    File Size: 78.3 MB
    Update Date: June 12, 2023

  • Version: 11.5.0
    File Size: 65.7 MB
    Update Date: November 8, 2022

When downloading older versions, ensure you choose a reliable source to guarantee file safety.

Conclusion

By following the steps above, you can easily download and install the old version of the CapCut Video Editor on your Android device. This process not only helps you resolve compatibility issues but also ensures smoother operation of the app. While enjoying the fun of video editing, always download apps from secure sources and update them to suitable versions regularly.

The older versions of CapCut are equally powerful, offering features for video trimming and adding special effects to meet your creative needs. If you haven’t tried it yet, get started now!
